name: Triathlon
description: A multi-discipline endurance sport consisting of swimming, cycling, and running.

name: Running
description: A fundamental sport for endurance and speed training.

name: Cycling
description: A great way to build endurance while enjoying nature.

name: Swimming
description: An essential part of triathlon and a great full-body workout.

name: Duathlon
description: A race format that includes running and cycling in a sequence.
